front.title: Security Parameter Index multiplexed Network Address Translation (SPINAT)

abstract.t: This drafts defines a Security Parameter Index multiplexed NetworkAddress Translator (SPINAT). The SPINAT method uses the SPI value ofESP packets to de-multiplex multiple IP addresses on single IPaddress. The solution presented in this draft requires a state inthe SPINAT node and in the peer node. The state establishmentrequires a control signaling messages carrying the SPI values.
